title: Pixel 1 broke. Screen went pink then black now not working. Charged and power button but nothing
content: My phone yesterday was working fine. I wentto put in my pocket and my screen went half screen and pink. I tried to switch off it wouldn't.  10 mins later it went black with the odd white flash at top of screen then nothing. I've tried to charge and press power button still nothing. When I press the power button on side it vibrates but nothing comes on. Think it has had it gutted. I think it is the electrics. Any idea before I habe to buy a new phone ðŸ˜£ðŸ˜£
